name: The Hyper Pop Collective - GDKO 2023 Round 1
name_original: The Hyper Pop Collective - GDKO 2023 Round 1
description:
This game was developed for round 1 of the GDKO game jam tournament. 
Task: Create a single level in a unique location.

So I decided to create a home base for "the hyper pop collective" a group of dope agents who fight crime and rave the night away on their time off. It's kind of a fever dream of a setting but its my baby and I love it haha.

Controls:

  • WASD
  • Arrow Keys
  • Space to Interact/Talk

Combat Controls (Only in Training Room):

  • Mouse to Aim
  • Left Mouse Button to Shot

Music: On and On by Piri & Tommy [Virji Remix]

Floors & Walls: https://petricakegames.itch.io/cosmic-lilac
